caption:
The photograph captures a serene rural or possibly semi-arid landscape, where a young boy is seen engaging in an activity by the water's edge. The boy is dressed in a striped shirt and dark pants, squatting and leaning forward to touch or play in the shallow water.

In the background, slightly out of focus, is a structure that appears to be a simple wooden cabin with a reasonably flat roof and a dark-colored curtain or cloth hung at the entrance, substituting as a door. The cabin is situated on a slightly elevated mound with sparse grass and a few scrubs, underlining the dryness of the area. There is a window visible on one side of the cabin with no visible glass.

The surrounding landscape features sandy ground and small bushes, indicating a dry or desert-like environment. The overall feel of the image is quite peaceful, focusing on everyday rural life and the simplicity of childhood play.
title: Colorado River on the Mexican side of the border
